data.what_is: Incomaker is an intelligent, automated marketing tool. It's also your one stop for all of your digital marketing. Email, SMS, analytics, CRM, you name it. Incomaker is designed to save you time and money by giving you everything you need on one platform.
data.product_description: Incomaker is an intelligent, automated marketing tool. It's also your one stop for all of your digital marketing. Email, SMS, analytics, CRM, you name it. Incomaker is designed to save you time and money by giving you everything you need on one platform.

plan_features:
Simple automation
Web pushes
Autoresponders
Birthday greetings
Abandoned cart
Heatmaps
Multiple user accounts
Individual user rights
Social media intelligence
Custom fields
Landing pages
User forms
Blogs
E-commerce platform plugins
Product recommendations
A/B/X Testing
Unlimited segmentation
Email & social media analytics
E-shop connected
Advanced reports
Product feeds
Web pop-ups

Emailing
SMS
Contacts and CRM
Social media
Dashboards
Basic reports
Intelligent contacts import
Email & SMS personalization
Image management
Campaign tracking
Segmentation

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Incomaker?
Ability to use social media communication. Post anything to Twitter and Facebook accounts simultaneously.

What do you dislike about Incomaker?
Glitch in sending emails and sms to customers.
Sending reports not available also.

What problems is Incomaker solving and how is that benefiting you?
Incomaker Analytics provides data across all of marketing to help make better decisions and to receive precise analysis about customers.

review_question_answers.answer: Incomaker Analytics provides data across all of marketing to help make better decisions and to receive precise analysis about customers.

initial_reviews.review_title: Best automation tool for social media, mailing, SMS.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Incomaker?
Easy to use, super fast tool for marketing automation.

What do you dislike about Incomaker?
I miss better explanation some functions I don't know.

What problems is Incomaker solving and how is that benefiting you?
Deliverability e-mails and fast posting to social networks was painass,  with Incomaker it is finally solved!
